original_title: Amazing Grace: The History and Theology of Calvinism
overview: "This video series boldly, clearly, and winsomely sets forth the glorious, saving grace of God in its splendor and will help thousands to understand the gospel better and so to be filled with praise for their Savior." Dr. E. Calvin Beisner, Associate professor of historical theology and social ethics, Knox Theological Seminary, Ft. Lauderdale, Florida
title: Amazing Grace: The History and Theology of Calvinism
